description:
"Dad, have you ever had a dream with a familiar sight?" "Yes, I have." Bonobono often sees the same sight in his dream. He asked his dad about the sight he sees, but it`s very different from what Bonobono sees. Raccoon and Chipmunk have their own sights as well. Bonobono and Chipmunk go off to search for the real sight from Bonobono`s dream.
Source: crunchyroll
